summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, extending, altering and establishing of West Graham Street, in the City of Seattle, across Lots Twenty-five (25) and Twenty-six (26), Spring Hill Park; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property benefited, in the manner provided by law.
